lore: It was a clear, starry night with a new moon when a gigantic ball of fire dyed the sky red. A Mage who was resting close by on her way to Vanelin witnessed the event, and she also observed that whatever it was had fallen not far from there. As she got closer, she found a smoking, scorched rock, and she decided to take it away to study. It turned out to contain minerals unknown to this world, and one of them specifically was capable of absorbing magic if the appropriate spell was applied. Thus, this Mage created the Arcian Warbeast, a creature who can mitigate the effects of certain types of magic that take place around it.
menagerieDialog: I do not wish to speak to you right now. I would prefer to return to where I came from.
You would dare to rip me from my portal and summon me to this dying world? You have no shame.
I am bound to serve you, but know that it is not by choice.
I do not belong here in your filthy Menagerie. I deserve my own quarters in your castle!
Give me freedom, or give me death!
name: Arcian Warbeast
